en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Nanjing

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Nanjing from next Monday (November 14) to November 16 to attend the 4th Hong Kong Legal Services Forum and speak at the opening ceremony.

Organised by the Department of Justice on a biennial basis at different places in the Mainland, the theme of the forum is "Jiangsu · Hong Kong - Together we seize global business opportunities". The forum aims to promote the role of Hong Kong as a centre for international legal and dispute resolution services in the Asia-Pacific region and the latest developments thereof, as well as highlight the international legal and dispute resolution services that can be provided by Hong Kong in the context of the Belt and Road Initiative.

During his stay in Nanjing, Mr Yuen will meet with officials of Jiangsu Province. He will also visit Nanjing Court of Arbitration for Hong Kong and Macao and meet with leaders of the Hong Kong and Macao legal expert service team of Jiangsu Province.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the morning on November 16.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師下星期一（十一月十四日）至十一月十六日訪問南京，出席在當地舉行的第四屆香港法律服務論壇，並在開幕禮上致辭。
該論壇由律政司主辦，兩年一度在內地不同地方舉行。是次論壇以「蘇港攜手合作，開拓全球商機」為主題，旨在推廣香港作為亞太區主要國際法律及解決爭議服務中心的重要角色和最新情況，以及香港為「一帶一路」建設可提供的國際法律和解決爭議服務。
訪問期間，他將與江蘇省官員會面。他也會參觀南京港澳仲裁院，以及和江蘇省港澳法律專家服務團的領導會面。
袁國強將於十一月十六日上午返港。
